book-store.description: Calculate lowest price for shopping basket only containing books from a single series

cases.description: A basket containing only a single book is charged full price.
A basket containing only two of the same book is charged full price.
No charge to carry around an empty basket.

description: A basket containing two different books is the cheapest grouping,
better than purchasing each book on its own.

cases.description: A basket of three different books is cheaper than grouping the books any other way.
A basket of four different books is cheaper than grouping the books any other way.
A basket of five different books is cheaper than grouping the books any other way.

description: A basket containing three pairs of three different books plus
one copy each of the other two books, not paired, is the least expensive
A basket containing four pairs of four different books plus
one copy of a book, not already paired, is the least expensive grouping.
One basket containing two each of the different books
One basket containing two each of the different books plus
one extra copy of any book in the series, is the least expensive grouping.
One basket containing two each of the different books plus
one extra copy each of any two different books is the least expensive grouping.
